testcase.title: RHSM-TC : rhsm.cli.tests.MigrationTests.testRhnMigrateClassicToRhsmShouldNotAutomaticallyEnableYumPluginsWhenAutoEnableIsOff
testcase.description: Verify that the yum plugins for /etc/yum/pluginconf.d/product-id.conf and /etc/yum/pluginconf.d/subscription-manager.conf are NOT automatically enabled by an execution of rhn-migrate-classic-to-rhsm when rhsm.auto_enable_yum_plugins is configured off.
